alert.note: Alert for Coastal Camden; Coastal Glynn; Inland Camden; Inland Glynn (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 17 at 8:21PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Very heavy rainfall will impact portions of northern Camden and Glynn Counties through 900 PM EDT... At 820 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a band of heavy rainfall along a line extending from near Darien to 7 miles northeast of Woodbine. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Urban and street flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Street and poor drainage area flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Brunswick, St. Simons Island, Dock Junction, Country Club Estates, Waverly, Thalmann, Sea Island, Everett, Jekyll Island and Tarboro. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Camden; Coastal Glynn; Inland Camden; Inland Glynn
